name: COOL BLOB FUTURE (FIFOgamedev)
description:
DESCRIPTION

You are a green blob living in a post-modern, red-and-blue blob future. Use other blobs to destroy buildings by dashing into them to pick them up and throw them around. Sometimes you'll need to use specific combos of blobs. If you get surrounded, don't be afraid to throw blobs into walls to kill them.

P.S. The objectives later on look like dicks. I'm sorry about that, it wasn't intentional. Or was it? Freud?

CREDITS

  • Anders on tunes and blob mouth moods/sounds.
  • phill on everything else.

INSTRUCTIONS

  • Analogue stick/arrows = move!
  • A-button/X key = dash/throw!
  • When you dash you're invincible and you pick up other blobs!
  • When you're holding blobs you can throw them!
  • My Uncle says to maybe try plugging in a second controller sometime?
